snippet: Their success in the Army’s premier leadership course is expected to inform decision-making about the future of women in combat operations.
abstract: Two female soldiers will graduate from Ranger School in Fort Benning, Ga, becoming first women to emerge from Army's top leadership course and one of most challenging training programs in military; their success could influence Army's decision on whether to continue barring women from combat service.
lead_paragraph: Their success in the Army’s premier leadership course is expected to inform decision-making about the future of women in combat operations.

headline.main: Two Female Soldiers Poised to Graduate From Ranger School
headline.print_headline: Two Women Will Graduate From Army’s Ranger School

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
